title: Raised Bisphenol A has a Significant Association with Adverse Reproductive Manifestations Rather than Biochemical or Hormonal Aberrations in Women with Polycystic Ovary Syndrome.
abstract: Bisphenol A (BPA) is a widely used industrial element. Recently it is suspected that BPA may disrupt the endocrine system to influence the manifestations of polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS).
journal: Journal of the ASEAN Federation of Endocrine Societies
